thread.title: Briana Buckley
thread.title_full: US Service Animals reviewed by Briana Buckley

author: Briana Buckley
title: Briana Buckley
text: I used this website after much research and many phone calls to other sites offering similar services. US Service Animals exceeded my expectations with their fast service, excellent customer service, and their ability to fix my registration after I noticed a small problem. This site gives you everything you need in a timely manner. I am so happy I found them.
